ygData.subject: Re: Anyone know the answer to this?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve never done this quest myself but maybe a bandage would help the farmhand? Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony ... From:	Paul McClung
ygData.messageBody:
I've never done this quest myself but maybe a bandage would help the farmhand?

Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Paul McClung [SMTP:p.e.mcclung@...]
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 10:49 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Anyone know the answer to this?

From: Paul McClung <p.e.mcclung@...>

I've been in Qeynos the last couple of days collecting bearskin and
wolfskin boots and belts.

However, Chandra and Baobob refuse to make bearskin and wolfskin cloaks
unless I help their familiy in West Karanas.

I found their familiy, but none seemed to need anyhelp, except for a
farmhand that was bit by a wolf and needed a potion from the Temple of Life.

No-one in the temple seemed to know anything about a potion of life, and
others wouldn't even deal with me, because I'm an atheist gnome wizard.


And so my question is:

Is this the quest that is needed to convince Chandra and Baobob to make the
Bearskin and wolfskin cloaks?

And if it is, how can I complete the quest?


If that isn't the proper quest, could you point me in the direction of the
quest that is the right one.

Thanks,
Flik
